title: How to Make Banana Breakfast Nuggets

steps.headline: Melt the peanut butter in a microwave-safe bowl.
steps.description: You may want to start out with 30 seconds on high, stir if needed, and heat again for a few seconds more to completely melt it.

steps.headline: Carefully dip each banana piece into the peanut butter.
steps.description: Use tongs to dip if you don't want to get your fingers messy.

steps.headline: Cover them with cereal.
steps.description: Add your favorite brand of cereal to a shallow platter. Roll each banana piece in it.

steps.headline: Refrigerate the cereal-covered nuggets until you serve them.

text: Melt the peanut butter in a microwave-safe bowl. You may want to start out with 30 seconds on high, stir if needed, and heat again for a few seconds more to completely melt it. Carefully dip each banana piece into the peanut butter. Use tongs to dip if you don't want to get your fingers messy. Cover them with cereal. Add your favorite brand of cereal to a shallow platter. Roll each banana piece in it. Refrigerate the cereal-covered nuggets until you serve them.
